INTET.AT.summary: Intertech S.A. Inter. Technologies distributes technology products in Greece. It operates as a distributor of various brands, such as Panasonic, iLuv, Ricoh, Gestetner, and Satellite. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Elliniko, Greece. Intertech S.A. Inter. Technologies was formerly a subsidiary of Demco Group.

LEBEK.AT.summary: N. Leventeris S.A. manufactures and sells wires and wire ropes in Greece. The company offers steel wires, steel wire ropes, combination ropes, fiber and mooring ropes, wire rope slings, chains, anchors, fiber slings, crosby products, and agricultural wire ropes, as well as accessories comprising hooks, turnbuckles, shackles, and wire rope thimbles. It also provides spring wires; synthetic and natural fiber ropes; clips; fenders; and special wire ropes for marine, fishing, elevator, hoist, overhead crane, crane, excavator, mine, quarry, and cultivation industries. The company was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Piraeus, Greece.
